author: DeltaBravo
title: IIoT Platform Company IROOTECH Stirs up European Market
summary: With its Internet of Things platform RootCloud, IROOTECH, the market leader for industrial IIoT solutions is now also active in Europe. Starting from Germany, IROOTECH wants to attract customers and establish itself in European Market with a European IIoT platform. The company will kick off with a presentation at the Hannover Messe 2018. HANNOVER, German, April 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- IROOTECH, founded in 2016, is hatched by the giant Sany, a global manufacturer of construction machinery. Sany, founded in 1989, has been well known in Germany. Today, IROOTECH has become an important industrial IoT platform company which provides IoT and big data services globally.
